nsgl.integer.random

Class Uniform

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsgl.integer.random.Uniform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Random, UsesRawGenerator

    public class Uniform
extends java.lang.Object
implements Random

    Title: UniformInt

    Description: Generates integer numbers following an uniform probability distribution

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Uniform(int max)
      Creates a uniform integer number generator in the interval [0,max)

      Creates a uniform integer number generator in the interval [min,max)
